Instruction: Collect all the ingredients. Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Lightly grease or line 10 muffin cups with paper liners.
Prepare the muffins by combining flour, baking soda, baking powder, and salt in a large bowl.
Mash bananas, white sugar, melted butter, and egg together in another bowl.
Combine the banana mixture with the flour mixture, stirring only until blended.
Spoon the batter into the prepared muffin cups, filling each approximately 3/4 full.

Prepare the crumb topping: In a small bowl, combine brown sugar, flour, and cinnamon. Use a fork to incorporate 1 tablespoon of butter until the mixture becomes crumbly; then sprinkle the topping over the muffins.
Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted in the middle comes out clean, about 18 to 20 minutes.
